description:
Table component with pagination, filtering, footer, child rows and grouping
Derived from https://github.com/react-tools/react-table
`import { PagingTable } from 'grommet-controls';`
``

decorations.description:
Visual settings of the various table elements.
Where applicable, those settings can be overriden at the column level
decorations.name: decorations

onFetchData.description: If specified, a function responsible for loading the data
onFetchData.name: onFetchData

filterable.description: Whether to display a filtering row
filterable.name: filterable

onFilteredChange.description: Callback to be called when the filter changes
onFilteredChange.name: onFilteredChange

type.name: (newFiltering: IFilteredProps[], column: IPagingTableColumn, value: any) => void

loading.description: Whether to display the loading indicator
loading.name: loading

manual.description: If true, the data is sorted manually in the onFetchData function
manual.name: manual

pages.description: Number of total pages of data, when loading the data manually
pages.name: pages

pageSizeOptions.description: Array of available page size options ([5, 10, 20, 25, 50, 100])
pageSizeOptions.name: pageSizeOptions

minRows.description: Minimum number of rows to display, even if no data is present
minRows.name: minRows

onPageChange.description: callback method called when the page changes
onPageChange.name: onPageChange

onPageSizeChange.description: callback method called when the page size changes
onPageSizeChange.name: onPageSizeChange

pivotBy.description: Array of columns to pivot (group) by
pivotBy.name: pivotBy

pivotDefaults.description: Default properties to be passed to the pivot component
pivotDefaults.name: pivotDefaults

resizable.description: Whether the columns can be resized
resizable.name: resizable

onResizedChange.description: callback method called when a column is resized
onResizedChange.name: onResizedChange

showPagination.description: Whether to display a paging row
showPagination.name: showPagination

showPaginationTop.description: Whether to display a paging row on top of the table
showPaginationTop.name: showPaginationTop

showPaginationBottom.description: Whether to display a paging row at the bottom of the table
showPaginationBottom.name: showPaginationBottom

sortable.description: Wheter the table headers will allow sorting of the of the data
sortable.name: sortable

defaultSorted.description: Array of default sorted columns and their sort order
defaultSorted.name: defaultSorted

type.name: (a: any, b: any, desc: boolean) => number

defaultSortDesc.description: Whether the default sorting is descending
defaultSortDesc.name: defaultSortDesc

type.name: (newSorted: IPagingTableSort[], column: IPagingTableColumn, additive: boolean) => void

hasHeaderGroups.description: whether the table has any header groups
hasHeaderGroups.name: hasHeaderGroups

SubComponent.description: react node for the expander sub row
SubComponent.name: SubComponent

collapseOnSortingChange.description: Whether to collapse expanded rows on sorting change
collapseOnSortingChange.name: collapseOnSortingChange

collapseOnPageChange.description: Whether to collapse expanded rows on page change
collapseOnPageChange.name: collapseOnPageChange

collapseOnDataChange.description: Whether to collapse expanded rows on data change
collapseOnDataChange.name: collapseOnDataChange

expanderDefaults.description: The default properties of the expander
expanderDefaults.name: expanderDefaults

onExpandedChange.description: callback called when the expanded changes on a row
onExpandedChange.name: onExpandedChange

type.name: (newExpanded: IExpanderProps, path: string[], event?: MouseEvent<HTMLDivElement, MouseEvent>) => void

previousText.description: The string text for 'Previous' pagination link
previousText.name: previousText

nextText.description: The string text for 'Next' pagination link
nextText.name: nextText

noDataText.description: The string text for 'no data' label
noDataText.name: noDataText

pageText.description: The string text for 'Page' pagination label
pageText.name: pageText

ofText.description: The string text for 'of' pagination label
ofText.name: ofText

rowsText.description: The string text for 'rows' filtering label
rowsText.name: rowsText

groupedByPivotKey.description: String key for group by pivot
groupedByPivotKey.name: groupedByPivotKey

TableComponent.description: React component to render the table element
TableComponent.name: TableComponent

TheadComponent.description: React component to render the thead element
TheadComponent.name: TheadComponent

TbodyComponent.description: React component to render the tbody element
TbodyComponent.name: TbodyComponent

TrGroupComponent.description: React component to render the tr group element
TrGroupComponent.name: TrGroupComponent

TrComponent.description: React component to render the tr element
TrComponent.name: TrComponent

ThComponent.description: React component to render the th element
ThComponent.name: ThComponent

TdComponent.description: React component to render the td element
TdComponent.name: TdComponent

CellTextComponent.description: React component to render the cell text element
CellTextComponent.name: CellTextComponent

TfootComponent.description: React component to render the tfoot element
TfootComponent.name: TfootComponent

PaginationComponent.description: React component to render the pagination element
PaginationComponent.name: PaginationComponent

LoadingComponent.description: React component to render the loading element
LoadingComponent.name: LoadingComponent

NoDataComponent.description: React component to render the 'no-data' element
NoDataComponent.name: NoDataComponent

ResizerComponent.description: React component to render the resizer element
ResizerComponent.name: ResizerComponent

ExpanderComponent.description: React component to render the expander element
ExpanderComponent.name: ExpanderComponent

PivotValueComponent.description: React component to render the pivot value element
PivotValueComponent.name: PivotValueComponent

PivotComponent.description: React component to render the pivot element
PivotComponent.name: PivotComponent

AggregatedComponent.description: React component to render the aggregated element
AggregatedComponent.name: AggregatedComponent

FilterComponent.description: React component to render the filter element
FilterComponent.name: FilterComponent

PadRowComponent.description: React component to render the pad row(empty row) element
PadRowComponent.name: PadRowComponent

getTableProps.description: function to return custom props for the table element
getTableProps.name: getTableProps

getTheadGroupProps.name: getTheadGroupProps

getTheadThProps.name: getTheadThProps

getTheadFilterTrProps.name: getTheadFilterTrProps

getFilterInputProps.name: getFilterInputProps

getTbodyProps.name: getTbodyProps

getTrGroupProps.description: function to return custom props for the group tr element
getTrGroupProps.name: getTrGroupProps

getTrProps.description: function to return custom props for the tr element
getTrProps.name: getTrProps

type.name: (rowIndex: number, finalState: IPagingTableState, rowInfo: IRowInfo, column: IPagingTableColumn, Table?: any) => BoxProps & BoxClickProps

getTdProps.name: getTdProps
